column1: Kata Robata////Foie gras & duck noodles - foie gras was like eating straight butter made from an animal. Luckily
column3: and I like animals even more
column4: so this was a winner for me. Duck breast was cold
column6: and undercooked and was pretty disappointing. The noodles also seemed undercooked and I found myself constantly trying to get pieces unstuck from my teeth. Also
